thread.title: Gucci helps Kering to fashion strong sales growth

title: Gucci helps Kering to fashion strong sales growth
text:
Gucci helps Kering to fashion strong sales growth Tuesday, February 13, 2018 - 01:43 
Gucci-owner Kering posts better-than-expected sales growth in the fourth quarter and said 2018 should be another solid year as the French group refocuses its business solely on luxury. Laura Frykberg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Gucci-owner Kering posts better-than-expected sales growth in the fourth quarter and said 2018 should be another solid year as the French group refocuses its business solely on luxury.
